snippet.title: Forest of Liars - announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Forest of Liars is an adventure game that delivers a different experience every time you play. You will encounter strange and extraordinary characters who can assist you on your quest to reach the center of the resplendent and dazzling wood : https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2046612117/forest-of-liars-a-narrative-adventure-game/description

http://www.forestofliars.com
Follow us on twitter : https://twitter.com/UmeshuLovers
and Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/forestofliars/

A video game by Umeshu Lovers, a studio funded by Sylvain Sarrailh and Arnaud Mollé.
Music by CloZee : https://soundcloud.com/clozee
Art Director Sylvain Sarrailh : https://twitter.com/sylvainsarrailh

Contact : umeshulovers@gmail.com
